description.value: Orc fangs train in matters of darkness, hoarding visibility so as to strike down their opposition without being seen.

system.classDetails:
Orc Fang Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Dark Emissions: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.Y53BJZC4Q6GYHO2U]{Dark Emissions}
  • Fang Vision: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.LT4O6WTMFZN15L3Z]{Fang Vision}
